thread.title: Greece and the Euro: The Never-Ending Story Starts Again - WSJ
thread.title_full: Greece and the Euro: The Never-Ending Story Starts Again - WSJ

author: Richard Barley
title: Greece and the Euro: The Never-Ending Story Starts Again - WSJ
text:
February in Europe: time for the Greek crisis to emerge from hibernation. The International Monetary Fund Tuesday warned again of a risk of a Greek exit from the eurozone. Debt relief remains the sticking point.

An outright reduction in Greece’s huge debt of around 1.75 times gross domestic product is politically impossible. The vast bulk of Greece’s debt is in low-interest loans with very long maturities, partially mitigating the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
